CustomField.description: The Chamber of Commerce number, consisting of 8 numbers (e.g., 00123456). This number is unique and will not change as long as the organisation exists. Subsidiaries (‘Nevenvestigingen’) of the organisation are registered using the same dossier number.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The registration number under which the organisation is registered in the company's country. For the Netherlands the Chamber of Commerce Number.
CustomField.label: Registration Number
